{{Quote|Khal Pono, perhaps... Khal Jhaqo... they don't like the idea of a woman leading a ''khalasar''.|Jorah Mormont to Daenerys Targaryen|The Night Lands}}
'''Jhaqo''' is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. He is a [[Dothraki]] [[Khal]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Jhaqo is a ''ko'' in Khal [[Drogo]]'s khalassar. After Drogo's fall from his horse and subsequent incapacitacion, Jhaqo is one of the several kos that declares himself Khal and takes a portion of the khalassar as his own. Among those who follow him is [[Mago]]Â (who is killed for challenging Drogo in the TV series, but in the book he is still alive for no such challengeÂ occurs), who becomes Jhaqo's [[bloodrider]].
